reviewText: The companion video to the "Getting the Mads Out" workbook is chock full of information that can be implemented immediately.  As a parent and teacher who has used Donna's methods for well over a decade, I can tell you that quite simply- THEY WORK.  So often we tell children they should not feel a certain way, like it is a button or switch they can press.  In fact, explaining "why" they feel this way is the most straight forward honest way I can think of.  Giving kids the tools they need to succeed is empowering.
